CustomField.description:
NOT TO BE DISPLAYED This formula return a number + a text (to sort alphabetically) The number is set so that 1 is the preference for which the day is the same that today the number 2 is the day after,... the number 7 is the day 6 days after today.
Then the text is here to order preferences by time of travel. We want it to be displayed in the right order (e.g: Travel Monday between 05:00 and 12:00 Travel Monday between 12:00 and 18:00 ...)
CustomField.label: display order
